meanings.definition: An impression made by the palm of a hand.
meanings.sent1: The detective found a palmprint on the window, helping solve the case.
meanings.sent2: She left her palmprint on the wet paint by accident.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat left a palmprint on the freshly baked pie.
meanings.sent4: His palmprint on her heart was a lasting symbol of their love.
meanings.sent5: The palmprint in the clay was a unique identifier for the artist.

meanings.definition: A unique pattern of ridges on the skin of the palm of a hand.
meanings.sent1: The forensic expert analyzed the palmprint to identify the suspect.
meanings.sent2: Her palmprint matched perfectly with the one found at the crime scene.
meanings.sent3: The palmprint on the cookie dough revealed who had been sneaking treats.
meanings.sent4: The palmprint of time was evident in the wrinkles on his hands.
meanings.sent5: The palmprint on the ancient artifact hinted at its mysterious origins.
